titleStmt.title: Davids hainous sinne. Heartie repentance. Heavie punishment. By Thomas Fuller Master of Arts of Sidnye Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Iohn Bellamie, dwelling at the three Golden Lyons in Cornehill,

notesStmt.note: The words "hainous .. punishment." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Golden Lyons in Cornehill
